item.description:
Just like last year, in-depth research it has been discovered that the best place for apple picking, selecting pumpkins, and challenging corn mazes is Dame Farm and Orchards right here in Providence County located in Johnston, RI.

http://www.damefarmandorchards.com/

The plan:

For those interested in carpooling ... We'll meet up around 11 am in Luongo Square (central Federal Hill where the Avery is located) to allow everyone to get some extra shuteye from any Friday night festivities.

Otherwise ... Meet up at the farm at 11:30 - 12:00 pm.  From there everyone is free to do as they please and set their own schedule.

Additional details:

Saturday and Sunday Hours - 9:30 am to 5:00 pm

Rain date: Sunday, October 7th.

I'll keep an eye on the weather and let everyone know if the event will be postponed to a later date and time.

Everyone is welcomed!  Definitely a kid friendly event!

Might want to wear some rugged clothes and footwear ... this is a farm of course.

Last year's photos:

http://www.meetup.com/newintown-995/photos/3758112/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting some sort of Penn State attire
item.name: Apple Picking, Pumpkin Selection, and Corn Maze Extravaganza!
